titleStmt.title: New proposition propounded to the City of London by the Lords and Commons concerning the raising speedy ayd for the reliefe of Hvll : vvhereunto is annexed the Parliaments resolution concerning Sir John Hotham and all those that are faithfull to the commands of the Parliament : whereunto is annexed His Majesties declaration to the Parliament concerning peace or warre with Hull.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
